name: 'The Rift' A 2022 HSC Major Work
description:
This project was created as a part of my HSC multimedia major work.

The Alpaca model was purchased, however I created the animations for it and applied them to the Unreal Engine 4 3rd person template.

WASD - for movement

Toggle Left Shift - sprint

Space - jump

Esc - to enter and exit pause menus

'The Rift.exe' is the file you'll need to open to start the game.

BE WARNED ITS LOUD! I never got around to fixing the sound please lower your volume before you launch. There is a start up sound to give you an idea on how loud it might be and an adjustable volume slider on the main menu! 

Many assets were used off of the UE Marketplace, however some assets were made entirely by myself. 

Enjoy :))
